name: @storagehub-sdk/root
description: Workspace root for StorageHub SDK monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --filter ./core run build && pnpm --filter ./client run build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter ./core run test -- --run && pnpm --filter ./client run test -- --run
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter ./core run lint && pnpm --filter ./client run lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter ./core run format && pnpm --filter ./client run format
scripts.format:check: pnpm --filter ./core run format:check && pnpm --filter ./client run format:check
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter ./core run typecheck && pnpm --filter ./client run typecheck
scripts.coverage: pnpm --filter ./core run coverage && pnpm --filter ./client run coverage
